data.text:
―If you're looking for Falcon-san, she left 1 hour and 35 minutes 
ago. So you won't find her in the dorms.

It was the day after I advised Smart Falcon to switch 
to Dirt. In order to sit down and talk about it 
again, I had asked to meet her again but……

Sorry for the late introduction. 
I'm Eishin Flash. I'm Smart Falcon-san's roommate.
data.name: Eishin Flash

data.text:
Are you…… Smart Falcon-san's trainer? If it's an emergency, 
I can contact her using my smartphone if you'd like.
data.name: Eishin Flash

data.text:
However, there's no guarantee that she'll respond. 
At this time, she might have her phone off or have it on standby.
data.name: Eishin Flash

data.text: ……Well, that's――
data.name: Eishin Flash

data.text:
―Oh man～, Silence Suzuka was amazing, wasn't she?! 
To think she'd pull that far ahead!
data.name: Spectator A

data.text:
Yeah, that's what we came here to see! I'm looking forward to 
Suzuka being the center during the Winning Live!
data.name: Spectator B

data.text:
I ended up coming to the racetrack searching for 
Smart Falcon. The stands were filled with spectators 
waiting for the Live to start. Among them……

Haaa～ that was so exciting……☆ 
Suzuka-chan, do your best～! Nennenene～n!
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
Waaaaaaaa!! 
Suzuka――!!
data.name: Loud Cheers

data.text:
――It was a wonderful Live, one that touched 
the hearts of all who saw it.

It was serene, but Silence Suzuka sang with the joy of running. 
And the crowd grew excited in response to that passion……

Uooooooooh, gusu……Suzuka-!! You're the best～!! I'll…… do my best 
tomorrow too!! Just like Suzuka, I'll make it through to the end!
data.name: Spectator A

data.text:
Before I realized it, I felt the same as the 
crowd, fascinated by the one on stage. At that 
moment, I looked toward Smart Falcon again―

Just like everyone else, she was captivated and gazing at the 
stage, though she seemed to be gaining something different……

The Live ended. Before I knew it, Smart Falcon had disappeared. 
Did she return to the dorms? No, she was definitely―

Okaaaaay, good work during the Live everyone-☆ 
Oh maaan, Suzuka-chan was amazing, huh～!?
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
But but, Falco won't lose to her and will hold her own Live! 
At the very least, remember the name☆ Music, start♪
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
As I thought, she was doing a performance at the 
riverside. I guess it was a strategy to capture 
a few fans after the Live was over. However―
Hey, that girl looks like an Uma Musume…… do you know who she is?
data.name: Passerby A

data.text:
No idea, I've never seen her before. Maybe she hasn't debuted 
yet? That aside, during that Live, Suzuka was―
data.name: Passerby B

data.text:
―Haa, haaa……how was that? 
It's my dream to someday stand on that big stage and sing too☆
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text: It's…… my dream……
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text: ……someday. I wonder when that will be.
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
Well, I guess there's nobody to answer that, huh? 
Guess I'll head back……――Ah.
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
――I…… ever since I was small, I've loved idols. Because they were 
cute, always smiling, and shining brilliantly.
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
I believed that someday I'd become an idol too, 
even without any basis. But that changed just 
a little bit―― the first time I saw a race.
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
I knew that Uma Musume sang and danced just like idols, but it 
was strange. At first, I wanted to just know the reason, so I 
went just to go see it……
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
But when I saw those girls running with all their strength, I was 
mesmerized! I was excited, and my heart wouldn't stop beating……
I couldn't look away even for a second.
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
But what was even more amazing was the Live right 
after that! The way they shined out there, the 
spotlights emphasized it even more……
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
―"This is it!" I thought. Uma Musume shined brightest during the 
race. And the Winning Live was the sublimation of that sparkle.
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
That's why…… I had decided. I wanted to be like them…… no! 
I wanted to shine brighter than any of them, and become an Umadol 
that could grant people hope!
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
――Right…… just like Suzuka-chan today. I want to win big races 
infront of so many spectators, and stand at the center.
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
I want to shine as an Umadol like that someday. 
Someday I want to stand there, and be the one to move people!
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
Someday…… without giving up and doing my best, 
someday…… believing in myself just like that, 
and continuing on without turning back but……
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
Ah, of course, that doesn't mean I've given up though. To Falco, 
becoming the Top Umadol is the dream I want to take hold of!
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
But today…… it just seemed like that dream was so far away. Maybe 
it was because Suzuka-chan is just way too amazing…… ahaha.
data.name: Smart Falcon

choices.text: On Dirt, you have a chance

data.text:
……Yeah, you're probably right. 
I do understand that already.
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
Ever since I enrolled, Sensei has tried recommending dirt for me 
a bunch of times. I was more "suited" to that, she said.
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
But you know…… Trainer-san understands too, right? 
On Dirt, I can't become the "Top" Umadol.
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
Right. No matter what I do on Dirt, I won't be able to 
stand on a big stage like Suzuka-chan did today.
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
The fans will inevitably be drawn to a place where there are more 
Star Uma Musume. It's only natural that in a place with so many 
girls competing, that there can be a Top.
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
It's true that if I did my best on Dirt, I'd have much better 
results than I do now, and I'd be able to stand at the center.
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
But…… it's not enough to be at the center of just anywhere. Since 
I had decided to become an Umadol, I wanted to aim for the Top!
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
I don't want to be limited on what stage I can 
dance on just because of aptitude. That's why 
Falco…… won't compromise. I can't compromise!
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
……it's kind of stupid don't you think? But I don't care what 
others think. I want to continue challenging turf. Until the day 
I take hold of my dream!
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
Now I understood why she was so set on turf. 
It's important to have a big dream. But……

『On Dirt, you can't become the Top』―― that's wrong. 
Though she would have to experience it herself……

choices.text: Can you take tomorrow off from school?
choices.processed: <size=41>Can you take tomorrow off from school?</size>

choices.text: Can you take tomorrow off from school?
choices.processed: <size=41>Can you take tomorrow off from school?</size>

data.text:
Hee!? Well…… if Trainer-san will contact them, 
then it will probably be fine…… but why?
data.name: Smart Falcon

choices.text: Falcon, there's a race I want you to see
choices.processed: <size=42>Falcon, there's a race I want you to see</size>

data.text:
……got it. I don't really understand but, 
tomorrow I'll tag along with you, Trainer-san!
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
But in exchange, I have a request too! 
Is that okay?
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text: Well, you see, Trainer-san――
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
It's not Falcon, call me Falco☆ 
Because it's cuter that way!
data.name: Smart Falcon
